alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:49PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cook and northeastern Lake Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 448 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, or 19 miles east of Ely, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Little Saganaga Lake around 515 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ensign Lake, Hudson Lake, Kekekabic Lake, Disappointment Lake, Alice Lake, Thomas Lake, Gabimichigami Lake, Knife Lake, Ojibway Lake and Lake Two. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near area lakes, get off or out of the water. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter inside a vehicle or sturdy structure now! Do not be caught on or in the water during a thunderstorm.
